body:
~~I don't know why or which editor creates a~~ macOS filesystem creates [.DS_Store](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.DS_Store) files in folders 
```
spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/.DS_Store
```
one should add this file to the ignore lists so that one does not get
```
==> Warning: Skipping package at /spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/.DS_Store. ".DS_Store" is not a valid Spack module name.
title: ignore .DS_Store.
